meanings.sent1: My auldest sweater is so cozy.

meanings.definition: Having existed for the longest time.
meanings.sent1: The auldest tradition in our family is to bake cookies on Christmas Eve.
meanings.sent2: The auldest castle in the kingdom is now a museum.

meanings.sent5: The auldest song in her heart brings comfort in times of need.
